remarks: Induction step for ~ dvmptfprod .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvmptfprodlem.xph $e |- F/ x ph $.
dvmptfprodlem.iph $e |- F/ i ph $.
dvmptfprodlem.jph $e |- F/ j ph $.
dvmptfprodlem.if $e |- F/_ i F $.
dvmptfprodlem.jg $e |- F/_ j G $.
dvmptfprodlem.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Fin ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. _V ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.db $e |- ( ph -> -. E e. D ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.ss $e |- ( ph -> ( D u. { E } ) C_ I ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.c $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) /\ j e. D ) -> C e. CC ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.dvp $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> prod_ i e. D A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ j e. D ( C x. prod_ i e. ( D \ { j } ) A ) ) ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.14 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> G e. CC ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.dvf $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> F ) ) = ( x e. X |-> G ) ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.f $e |- ( i = E -> A = F ) $.
dvmptfprodlem.cg $e |- ( j = E -> C = G ) $.
dvmptfprodlem $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> prod_ i e. ( D u. { E } ) A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ j e. ( D u. { E } ) ( C x. prod_ i e. ( ( D u. { E } ) \ { j } ) A ) ) ) $.
$d A j $.
$d D i j x $.
$d E i j x $.
$d F j $.
$d I i $.
$d X i j x $.
